Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardUpdated on 07 Jun 2019You can even start with $100! Stashaway is very accessible for people with small capital. The fees are a percentage based on AUM/portfolio value. Below $25k the fees are 0.8%.2 comments1

Why should I consider monthly deposits, though?Gabriel Tham13 May 2019It doesn't have to be monthly however if you can it is good to consistently add more money to allow your investment to compound at a greater rate. The earlier you start the better and the longer you stay invested even better
